Header: Central Troops Support Blood Donation Programme
Content: Troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) gave their fullest support to conduct a blood donation campaign, held on Wednesday (1) at the Sri Lanka Electricity Board, Peradeniya in Kandy to commemorate its 49th Anniversary. Major General Ruwan de Silva, Commander, Security Forces - Central (SF-Cen) directed Army soldiers to assist the event at the request of the Peradeniya, Sri Lanka Electricity Board authorities. More than 37 Army personnel including Officers donated their blood during the programme under the close supervision of Major General T.J Nanayakkara, General Officer Commanding (GOC) 11 Division.
